column1: With no rewards program, there will be no distinction between who's a native to this island and who isn't!
By the gods! Perhaps he has the heart of a native after all!
Hello? Anybody? We'd like to be rescued, please. Any day now.
Hey, we'll take it!  Over here, yes! Thank you! Thank you!  Oh, thanks. Thanks. That's a LOT better.
Oh wow, thank you so much! What a swift and speedy rescue!
